entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 p.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
